readable.title: 1387461595_2fe6925f73
readable.content: men are standing beside a stonesign A man in a suit and two men in orange vests standing around These men are standing next to a " Penzance welcomes you " stone . Three men standing near a large stone sign . two men in hi-viz jackets are talking to a man in suit next to the Penzance welcome sign that is carved into a rock .
